title: Pedro Pascal Stars in HBO's The Last of Us - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.11.21
description:
PC Mag's M.H. Williams joins Greg to talk about HBO finding its Joel and Ellie, Ratchet and Clank: A Rift Apart getting a release date, and more! 

Follow M.H.: https://twitter.com/AutomaticZen

00:00:00 - Start
00:04:50 - Housekeeping
Barrett’s Assassin's Creed In Review: a Kinda Funny Games In Review special is two hours long and up on youtube.com/kindafunnygames
Roger’s Little Nightmares II review is up on youtube.com/kindafunnygames.
Saturday is Wild Aces Game Day -- the Fan Controlled Football season starts with the Wild Aces squaring off against Quavo and Richard Sherman’s Glacier Boyz. We’ll be streaming the game at 5 p.m. PT on Saturday.
AFTER the game, stick around for Love, Sex, and Stuff’s live Valentine’s Day Call-in show.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: GrahamOfLegend, David Meintel, Trent Berrie, Black Jack, Luiz Aguiar (@8bitLuiz), James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), &The Nano Biologist
The Roper Report   -
00:07:12 - Pedro Pascal Joins Bella Ramsey to Star in HBO's 'Last of Us,'
00:09:35 - Could The Last of Us casting be anymore fucking perfect? - Best Friends Q:Luciddre4m
00:14:20 - I WANT ANOTHER 'THE LAST OF US' GAME!! - Best Friends Q:rita
00:18:50 - Ratchet and Clank: A Rift Apart Coming June 11, 2021
00:22:10 - Do you think the industry has finally gotten over that hesitancy to put out games during the usually-barren summer months?  - Best Friends Q:Nathan Choquette
00:25:42 - Borderlands Info Dump
00:32:50 - Six Days in Fallujah is Back for some fucking reason, Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:41:14 -  Ad
00:43:25 - DICE LA Working on a Battlefield?  Sherif Saed @ VG247
00:46:26 - Pokemon Go Developer Creates Black Developers Initiative To Fund And Support Games, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:50:02 - Out today
00:51:55 - Ashley Palek(PS5) - Apricot99
00:53:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Imran Khan
